jsbreadcrumbs-desc: Adds a trail of bread crumbs below the tab bar
prefs-jsbreadcrumbs-numberofcrumbs: Maximum number of bread crumbs to display
prefs-jsbreadcrumbs-maxlength-horizontal: Maximum length to display for each bread crumb when horizontal
prefs-jsbreadcrumbs-maxlength-vertical: Maximum length to display for each bread crumb when vertical
prefs-jsbreadcrumbs-horizontal: Orientation of bread crumb trail is horizontal
prefs-jsbreadcrumbs-showsite: Prefix bread crumbs with name of site
prefs-jsbreadcrumbs-domain: Show bread crumbs for all sites on this domain
